name: iconly

description:
500+ Free icons for your next project in 5 styles (Light, Bold, Bulk, Two-tone, Broken)


What's inside:
— 5 Styles (Light, Bold, Bulk, Two-tone, Broken)
— Organized library for Figma
— Fully vector
— Grid size 24px
— Pixel Perfect
— Trendy
— Easy to use in Figma



We hope you guys enjoy using it :star_struck:
